alert.note: Alert for Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 23 at 8:15PM MDT until June 23 at 9:15PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM MDT FOR NORTHEASTERN OGLALA LAKOTA...SOUTHWESTERN JACKSON AND SOUTHEASTERN PENNINGTON COUNTIES... At 814 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles east of Potato Creek to 4 miles southeast of Owanka, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Owanka, Interior and Cedar Pass. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight MDT for southwestern and west central South Dakota. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
